Name: Alternative Title
Definition: An alternative to an original title.

Name: Formal Title
Definition: A standardised title in which the elements are arranged in a pre-determined order. Normally created for classical works.

Name: Incorrect Title
Definition: A spurious or unacceptable title sometimes mistakenly used for identification.

Name: Original Title
Definition: A title given to the work by its creator(s) shown in its original language.

Name: Original Title Translated
Definition: An original title translated into a different language.

Name: Part Title
Definition: A section of a work which is not recognized as an excerpt in its own right and does not have its own ISWC.

Name: Restricted Title
Definition: A title from which all initial articles and punctuation have been removed.

Name: Extra Search Title
Definition: An alternate title created to aid database searching (e.g. where special characters, puns, or slang have been replaced by standardized elements).

Name: Original Title with National Characters
Definition: The Original title of the Work in it’s original language, using ‘accented’ National characters

Name: Alternative Title with National Characters
Definition: An alternatice work title in it’s original language, using ‘accented ‘ National characters.
